titleInfo.title: I Don't Blame You - Ernest Tubb performance ; Old Fashioned Love - T. Texas Tyler

mods.abstract: Performance of I Don't Blame You, written by Ernest Tubb and Jim Scott, and performed by Ernest Tubb. Performance of Old Fashioned Love, written by James P. Johnson and Cecil Mack (Richard C. McPherson), and performed by T. Texas Tyler.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
